posts.post_content:
Posted By: david Poses
Looking for all T206 Pirates unslabbed. Trimmed is ok. Back paper loss/damage/writing is ok. 
As long as front is clean, not heavily creased, and has no paper loss, I'm interested. 

Please send scans and prices to: davidposes@gmail.com

Thanks.

-David

Posted By: Mike
Mail sent, David.

Posted By: raymond g.
David,
  Seen your post. Currently my email is OUT, so I could not send this via email.  So I am using the forum to respond.  IF YOUR INTERESTED IN "THE COMPLETE LISTING - GRADED T206 PIRATES", send me a response via Net54!  I don't know when my email will be up and running??
Ray Pasternak
